name: Finding Your Place
description:
Finding Your Place is a adventures story of find a place where you fit in:

You can communicate with others and use them to help you find your place!

The player will go on a miraculous adventure, going from Out Of Place to In Place!

Controls:

WASD and Arrow Keys to move

Space to jump

E to interact with Npc's (Cubes with Exclamation Points above their heads)

E to close Dialog or walk away

Goal:

Push the Npc's to help you get to the Goal (yellow orb)

Credits:

I hope you enjoyed the game, I will be making a YouTube video on how I made this game check it out, Tycrate1 Studios!

This was made for the Completion Jam!

Special thanks to Deynum for Hosting this game jam, Go check him out at Deynum Studios!
